Key exclusion criterion : pregnant woman woman childbearing age , currently take medication weight loss , enrol another clinical trial , plan bariatric surgery . Any patient take medication prescribe physician depression , anxiety , psychiatric disorder exclude . Patients glucocorticoids excess Prednisone 7.5 mg equivalent also exclude . Optimally , equal number group ; however , group size may unequal depend relative proportion high versus low responder .
